linePassword.title: Change SIP password
linePassword.info: The SIP password is used to configure your phone or softphone. After changing it, you will need to reconfigure your devices.
linePassword.passwordHint: 8-20 characters, at least 1 uppercase, 1 lowercase and 1 digit

forward.title: Configure call forwarding
forward.info: Configure forwarding of your calls to another phone number.

filter.title: Add call filter
filter.blacklistHint: Calls from this number will be rejected
filter.whitelistHint: Only calls from this number will be accepted
filter.numberHint: International format or prefix (e.g., +336 for FR mobiles)

greeting.title: Upload voice greeting
greeting.info: The voice greeting will be played to callers when they reach your voicemail.
greeting.dropzone: Drag and drop your audio file here
greeting.fileHint: WAV, MP3 or OGG - Max 5 MB - Max duration 2 minutes

agent.title: Add agent
agent.numberHint: Agent phone number (internal line or external)
agent.wrapUpHint: Delay before receiving a new call after hanging up

numberConfig.title: Number configuration
numberConfig.warning: Changing the feature type may result in configuration loss. Make sure to backup your settings.
